articles.title: Review and setlist: Ripe keeps it fresh the second time around at MGM Music Hall
articles.description:
The funk and alt pop act, who got started in Boston as students at Berklee College of Music, brought things home in fine style.

articles.title: 5 things to know about the Bengals ahead of Sunday’s game vs. Patriots
articles.description:
The Bengals' season has been derailed due to Joe Burrow's injury and other reasons, but the Patriots should know from last year's matchup that anything can happen on any given Sunday.
